hehehe SHH don't remind em ;)

> IIRC, Verant stated before Kunark was released that some of the new magic
> items that would be found in Kunark would be deity specific. Guess they
> decided not to implement the idea.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>

> > If you are agonistic or a worshipper of Bristlebane, and have never
taken

> the Iksar Hide Mask are, essentially, utterly worthless as a consequence.

> the vision stuff.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
